item.title: How To Use a Python Code To Scrape Internshala
item.description: And Automatically Apply To Each Internship Above 5K In Your Preferred Job Profile | Part 1-of-2 Import The Necessary Libraries Selenium is one of the most popular packages used for Web-Scraping, along with BeautifulSoup. Apart from simple Web-Scraping, Selenium provides the added advantage of being able to simulate the human behavior of scrolling and clicking.
